With its exceptional features and unmatched quality, it's truly a valuable asset worth $8,000. I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is exclusive to you and comes with a satisfaction guarantee. Don't miss out on this exceptional deal! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer
